div.p: K.-J.W., X.-Z.G., G.-R.Z. and Q.-W.W. conceived and designed the study; X.-Z.G. collected the samples from the field; X.-Z.G., G.-R.Z., W.J. and R.-J.Y. performed experiments; X.-Z.G., K.-J.W., G.-R.Z. and J.P.A.G. analysed the data; X.-Z.G., K.-J.W. and J.P.A.G. wrote the article; all authors discussed the results and commented on the manuscript.
